Package org.simplity.kernel.file

We have to deal with files in application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileIterator
    an iterator that gives you next file from a folder, recursively going thru sub-folders.
    FileManager
    File has a simple conotation to most programmers : it is available on the disk.
    Files  

Package org.simplity.kernel.file Description

We have to deal with files in application. Programmers are used to having files on a disk. And typically they assume, without thinking about it, that the same file system is available across layers. We intend to provide set of utility lasses that help programmers to go ahead with such assumptions, without worrying about deployment scenarios
Author:
simplity.org
